meanings.sent1: She counted the marbles and found an odd number left.
meanings.sent2: The odd socks in the drawer didn't have a match.
meanings.sent3: It was odd to see a cat wearing sunglasses.
meanings.sent4: The old house had an odd charm to it.
meanings.sent5: The odd-shaped cloud resembled a dragon in the sky.

meanings.definition: Different from what is usual or expected.
meanings.sent1: The odd weather patterns confused the meteorologists.
meanings.sent2: It was odd to see a penguin in the desert.
meanings.sent3: The odd sight of a dog riding a skateboard made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her odd choice of outfit raised some eyebrows.
meanings.sent5: The odd behavior of the robot puzzled its creators.

meanings.sent1: The odd noise coming from the attic scared the children.
meanings.sent2: It was odd to find a pineapple growing in the backyard.
meanings.sent3: The odd smell of the new perfume made her sneeze.
meanings.sent4: His odd collection of vintage toys fascinated visitors.
meanings.sent5: The odd glow in the dark forest gave it an eerie feel.
